amendment.description: Amendment to add to the findings the importance of averting, minimizing and addressing loss and damage associated with the adverse effects of climate change.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in House Report 116-42 to add to the findings the importance of averting, minimizing and addressing loss and damage associated with the adverse effects of climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Drew amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 257 - 167 (Roll no. 181).

action.text: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Van Drew.
